item.description: Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0384; 07:17AM; 11160 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OEnCYW; #Pacoima; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision. Four patients total (1 critical, 1 serious, 2 minor injuries), one person is trapped. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #909); FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 E91 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA91 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0294; 06:08AM; 2029 W Jefferson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u1Mz7h; Jefferson Park; KNOCKDOWN: 50 FF extinguished the fire in 39 minutes with no injuries reported. The original fire building is a total loss while firefighters stopped an attic fire burning in the exposed commercial building on the Delta (East) side. The exposed building is described as a one story commercial building with 3 occupancies (estimated). ; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E15 E203 E205 E226 E229 E26 E27 E294 E68 E94 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA15 RA34 RA94 T26 T29 T3 T5 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0294; 05:43AM; 2029 W Jefferson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u1Mz7h; Jefferson Park; The one story commercial building is heavily involved in fire and two additional task forces are enroute. The building on the Delta (East) side of the building has possible extension into the attic (one story bungalow). Firefighters are using a wagon battery off an engine to knock back the fire while heavy streams and hand lines are being deployed. ; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E15 E203 E205 E226 E229 E26 E27 E294 E68 E94 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA34 T26 T29 T3 T5 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0294; 05:29AM; 2029 W Jefferson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u1Mz7h; Jefferson Park; One story, commercial building with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There is at least one additional building exposed.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E15 E226 E94 RA34 T26; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update FATALITY Structure Fire; INC#0242; 04:54AM; 1359 W 54th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/2OGRVDV; Vermont Square; After knockdown, firefighters were overhauling the fire and located a deceased person inside the vehicle (this was an auto fire which extended into the commercial building). LAFD Arson investigators and LAPD are responding with the preliminary reports on scene of the victim being a 15yo M passenger and one additional person in the vehicle safely exited prior to LAFD arrival. There are no further details for release while the incident is under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC13 E21 E233 E266 E33 E66 RA266 RA66 T33 T66; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0242; 04:28AM; 1359 W 54th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/2OGRVDV; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E233 E266 E33 E66 RA266 RA66 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0242; 04:04AM; 1359 W 54th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/2OGRVDV; Vermont Square; An auto fire extended into a one story, commercial building. Firefighters are in the offensive mode with a confirmed attic fire. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E233 E266 E33 E66 RA266 RA66 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Stuck Elevator; INC#0760; 12:14PM; 7s Lax; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gJxdRD; Westchester; A power outage at the Los Angeles International Airport has resulted in over a dozen "stuck elevator" calls since approximately 11:30AM. There are no reported injuries and the exact number of persons trapped is not known. Firefighters are continuing to address any stuck elevators throughout the facility. Any media questions regarding the power outage are referred to LAWA officials. No further details. (This incident number is being used for the command team on site running the incident while the individual 'stuck elevator' calls each carry their own incident number); FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E264 T64; CH7; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1312; 07:17PM; 18540 W Collins St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F3DOQr; Tarzana; A total of two patients were transport: One patient (27 yo F) in fair condition with possible smoke inhalation. One patient 45yo F (unknown condition) with unspecified injuries. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E293 E83 E84 E90 E93 EA1 EM17 RA100 RA84 RA88 RA96 T73 T88 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1312; 06:49PM; 18540 W Collins St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F3DOQr; Tarzana; KNOCKDOWN: 55 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in 23 minutes. There are a total of four units involved in the fire (extent of damage of each unit is not available at this time). A primary and secondary search found no occupants in any of the units. The four persons (two children, two adults) who were brought down from the 2nd floor balcony (via fire department ladder) are being assessed for any injuries. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E293 E83 E84 E90 E93 EA1 EM17 RA100 RA84 RA88 RA96 T73 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
